title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.

title: [PR] Fix Exoscale GPU instance type lookup: match by family+size fields instead of non-existent name field
summary:
The Exoscale API returns instance types with separate `family` and `size` fields — there is no `name` field. Both adapters were matching against `itype.get("name")`, which always returned `None`, causing all GPU instance creation to fail.

```
WARNING - Instance type 'gpua5000.small' not found
ERROR

title: [PR] Feature/chroma memory service
summary:
**Problem:**
The current `InMemoryMemoryService` uses simple keyword matching to search agent memories. This means:
- Synonyms don't work ("happy" won't match "joyful")
- Context is lost (keyword matching ignores semantic meaning)
- No persistence (all memories are lost on restart)

The `Verte
